name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions:
Lie flat on bench with feet on floor
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulder width
Lower bar to mid-chest with control
Press bar back up until arms fully extended
Keep shoulder blades retracted throughout

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions:
Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
Hold dumbbells at shoulder level
Press dumbbells up and slightly together
Lower with control to starting position
Keep core engaged throughout

name: Cable Chest Fly
instructions:
Set cables to chest height
Grab handles with arms extended
Slight bend in elbows
Bring hands together in front of chest
Control return to starting position

name: Push-Up
instructions:
Start in plank position
Hands slightly wider than shoulders
Lower body until chest nearly touches floor
Keep core tight and back straight
Push back up to starting position

name: Dumbbell Chest Press
instructions:
Lie flat on bench holding dumbbells
Start with dumbbells at chest level
Press dumbbells up until arms extended
Lower with control back to chest
Keep wrists straight throughout

name: Decline Bench Press
instructions:
Set bench to decline angle
Secure feet under pad
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Lower bar to lower chest
Press back up to starting position

name: Chest Dips
instructions:
Grip parallel bars with arms extended
Lean forward slightly
Lower body by bending elbows
Go down until shoulders below elbows
Press back up to starting position

name: Machine Chest Press
instructions:
Adjust seat so handles at chest level
Grab handles with firm grip
Press handles forward until arms extended
Return with control to starting position
Keep back against pad

name: Barbell Squat
instructions:
Bar on upper back across shoulders
Feet shoulder width apart
Lower by bending knees and hips
Go down until thighs parallel to floor
Drive through heels to stand

name: Leg Press
instructions:
Sit in machine with back against pad
Feet shoulder width on platform
Lower weight by bending knees
Stop before knees go past 90 degrees
Press back up through heels

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions:
Stand with barbell at thigh level
Slight bend in knees
Hinge at hips pushing them back
Lower bar along shins
Feel stretch in hamstrings then return

name: Walking Lunge
instructions:
Hold dumbbells at sides
Step forward into lunge position
Lower back knee toward floor
Push off front foot to step forward
Alternate legs while moving forward

name: Leg Curl
instructions:
Lie face down on machine
Ankles under pad
Curl legs up toward glutes
Squeeze hamstrings at top
Lower with control

name: Leg Extension
instructions:
Sit in machine with back against pad
Shins behind pad
Extend legs until fully straight
Squeeze quads at top
Lower with control

name: Goblet Squat
instructions:
Hold dumbbell at chest level
Feet shoulder width apart
Squat down keeping chest up
Elbows inside knees at bottom
Drive through heels to stand

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions:
Place back foot on bench behind you
Hold dumbbells at sides
Lower into lunge position
Front knee over ankle
Push through front heel to stand

name: Calf Raise
instructions:
Stand on calf raise machine
Shoulders under pads
Raise heels as high as possible
Squeeze calves at top
Lower with control

name: Front Squat
instructions:
Bar rests on front shoulders
Elbows high pointing forward
Squat down keeping torso upright
Go as low as mobility allows
Drive up through heels

name: Deadlift
instructions:
Feet hip width under bar
Grip bar just outside knees
Chest up back flat
Drive through heels extending hips and knees
Stand fully erect at top

name: Pull-Up
instructions:
Hang from bar with overhand grip
Hands slightly wider than shoulders
Pull body up until chin over bar
Engage back and squeeze shoulder blades
Lower with control

name: Bent Over Barbell Row
instructions:
Bend at hips with back flat
Grip bar with hands shoulder width
Pull bar to lower chest
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Lower bar with control

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions:
Sit at lat pulldown machine
Grip bar wider than shoulders
Pull bar down to upper chest
Squeeze back at bottom
Control bar back up

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions:
Sit at cable row machine
Feet on platform knees slightly bent
Pull handles to torso
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Extend arms back to start

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
instructions:
Place one knee and hand on bench
Hold dumbbell in other hand
Pull dumbbell to hip
Keep back flat throughout
Lower with control

name: T-Bar Row
instructions:
Straddle bar with feet shoulder width
Bend at hips keeping back flat
Grip handles and pull to chest
Squeeze back at top
Lower with control

name: Face Pull
instructions:
Set cable to face height with rope
Grip rope ends with thumbs up
Pull rope toward face
Elbows high flaring out
Squeeze shoulder blades together

name: Barbell Overhead Press
instructions:
Bar at shoulder level
Feet shoulder width apart
Press bar straight overhead
Fully extend arms at top
Lower with control to shoulders

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions:
Sit with dumbbells at shoulder level
Press dumbbells overhead
Extend arms fully at top
Lower with control to start
Keep core engaged

name: Lateral Raise
instructions:
Stand with dumbbells at sides
Slight bend in elbows
Raise arms out to sides
Stop at shoulder height
Lower with control

name: Front Raise
instructions:
Stand with dumbbells in front of thighs
Raise arms straight forward
Stop at shoulder height
Keep slight bend in elbows
Lower with control

name: Rear Delt Fly
instructions:
Bend at hips chest toward floor
Arms hanging with dumbbells
Raise arms out to sides
Squeeze shoulder blades
Lower with control

name: Arnold Press
instructions:
Start with dumbbells at chest palms facing you
Rotate palms forward while pressing up
Extend arms overhead
Reverse motion on way down
End with palms facing you

name: Upright Row
instructions:
Hold bar with narrow overhand grip
Pull bar straight up along body
Elbows lead the movement
Raise to chest height
Lower with control

name: Barbell Bicep Curl
instructions:
Stand with bar at arm's length
Grip bar with underhand grip
Curl bar up to shoulders
Keep elbows stationary
Lower with control

name: Dumbbell Curl
instructions:
Stand with dumbbells at sides
Curl both dumbbells up
Rotate palms to face shoulders
Squeeze biceps at top
Lower with control

name: Hammer Curl
instructions:
Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other
Keep palms neutral throughout
Curl dumbbells up
Squeeze at top
Lower with control

name: Tricep Dips
instructions:
Grip parallel bars or bench
Body upright elbows back
Lower body by bending elbows
Go down until 90 degree angle
Press back up

name: Tricep Pushdown
instructions:
Stand at cable machine
Grip bar with overhand grip
Elbows at sides push bar down
Fully extend arms at bottom
Return with control

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions:
Hold one dumbbell with both hands overhead
Lower behind head bending elbows
Keep elbows pointing up
Extend arms back overhead
Control throughout movement

name: Preacher Curl
instructions:
Sit at preacher bench
Arms extended over pad
Curl bar up toward shoulders
Squeeze biceps at top
Lower with control

name: Close Grip Bench Press
instructions:
Lie on bench with narrow grip
Hands about shoulder width
Lower bar to lower chest
Keep elbows tucked in
Press back up

name: Plank
instructions:
Support body on forearms and toes
Body in straight line
Engage core and glutes
Keep hips level
Hold position

name: Russian Twist
instructions:
Sit with knees bent feet off floor
Lean back slightly
Hold weight at chest
Rotate torso side to side
Touch weight to floor each side

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions:
Lie on back hands behind head
Bring opposite elbow to opposite knee
Extend other leg straight
Alternate sides in pedaling motion
Keep core engaged

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions:
Hang from pull up bar
Keep legs together
Raise legs up toward chest
Control movement
Lower with control

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions:
Kneel holding ab wheel
Roll wheel forward extending body
Keep core tight
Go as far as control allows
Roll back to start

name: Cable Crunch
instructions:
Kneel in front of cable machine
Grip rope attachment overhead
Crunch down bringing elbows to knees
Squeeze abs at bottom
Return with control

name: Mountain Climber
instructions:
Start in push up position
Bring one knee toward chest
Quickly switch legs
Maintain plank position
Keep core engaged

name: Side Plank
instructions:
Lie on side supported on forearm
Stack feet and hips
Lift hips off ground
Body in straight line
Hold position

name: Dead Bug
instructions:
Lie on back arms extended up
Knees bent at 90 degrees
Lower opposite arm and leg
Return to start
Alternate sides

name: Cable Crossover
instructions:
Set cables to high position
Grab handles with arms extended
Step forward with staggered stance
Bring handles down and across body
Squeeze chest at bottom

name: Incline Barbell Press
instructions:
Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Lower bar to upper chest
Press back up to full extension
Keep feet planted on floor

name: Pec Deck Fly
instructions:
Sit with back against pad
Grab handles at chest level
Bring handles together in front
Squeeze chest at peak contraction
Return arms to starting position

name: Diamond Push-Up
instructions:
Get in push up position
Place hands together forming diamond
Lower chest toward hands
Keep elbows close to body
Press back up to start

name: Landmine Press
instructions:
Stand holding end of barbell at chest
Press barbell up and forward
Extend arm fully at top
Control weight back to chest
Keep core engaged throughout

name: Svend Press
instructions:
Hold weight plates together at chest
Squeeze plates hard together
Press plates straight forward
Fully extend arms
Bring back to chest maintaining squeeze

name: Hack Squat
instructions:
Stand in hack squat machine
Feet shoulder width on platform
Release safety and lower body
Go down until thighs parallel
Drive through heels to stand

name: Sissy Squat
instructions:
Stand with feet hip width
Hold onto support for balance
Lean back while bending knees
Lower body keeping thighs and torso aligned
Rise back up using quads

name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
instructions:
Kneel with ankles secured
Lower torso forward with control
Keep body straight from knees to head
Go as far as control allows
Push back up using hamstrings

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions:
Stance wider than shoulders toes out
Grip bar inside knees
Chest up back flat
Drive through heels extending hips
Stand fully erect squeezing glutes

name: Box Jump
instructions:
Stand facing sturdy box or platform
Swing arms and jump explosively
Land softly on box with both feet
Stand fully on box
Step down carefully

name: Barbell Glute Bridge
instructions:
Lie on back with barbell over hips
Feet flat on floor knees bent
Drive hips up squeezing glutes
Raise until body forms straight line
Lower with control

name: Dumbbell Step-Up
instructions:
Hold dumbbells at sides
Place one foot on bench or box
Drive through heel to step up
Bring other foot to platform
Step down and alternate legs

name: Hip Thrust
instructions:
Upper back on bench with barbell over hips
Feet flat on floor
Drive hips up squeezing glutes
Raise until thighs parallel to floor
Lower hips back down

name: Pendlay Row
instructions:
Bend at hips torso parallel to floor
Grip bar with arms extended
Pull bar explosively to chest
Return bar to floor between reps
Reset position each rep

name: Chest Supported Row
instructions:
Lie chest down on incline bench
Hold dumbbells hanging down
Pull dumbbells to sides
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Lower with control

name: Inverted Row
instructions:
Hang under bar body straight
Feet on ground heels down
Pull chest to bar
Keep body in straight line
Lower back to start

name: Cable Pullover
instructions:
Stand facing high cable with rope
Grip rope with arms extended overhead
Pull rope down to thighs
Keep arms relatively straight
Return with control

name: Meadows Row
instructions:
Stand perpendicular to landmine
Grip end of bar with one hand
Row bar to hip
Rotate torso slightly
Lower with control

name: Rack Pull
instructions:
Set bar on rack at knee height
Grip bar just outside knees
Drive through heels extending hips
Pull until standing fully erect
Lower bar back to rack

name: Wide Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions:
Grip bar wider than shoulders
Sit with thighs under pad
Pull bar to upper chest
Lean back slightly
Control bar back up

name: Back Hyperextension
instructions:
Position body on hyperextension bench
Cross arms over chest
Lower torso toward floor
Raise back up to parallel
Squeeze glutes and lower back

name: Standing Military Press
instructions:
Stand with bar at shoulders
Feet shoulder width apart
Press bar strictly overhead
No leg drive or lean
Lower back to shoulders

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions:
Stand sideways to low cable
Grab handle with far hand
Raise arm out to side
Stop at shoulder height
Lower with control

name: Behind the Neck Press
instructions:
Bar rests on upper back
Grip wider than shoulders
Press bar overhead from behind
Fully extend arms
Lower back to starting position

name: Pike Push-Up
instructions:
Start in downward dog position
Hips high forming inverted V
Lower head toward floor
Keep elbows tracking back
Press back up to start

name: Reverse Pec Deck
instructions:
Sit facing pec deck machine
Grab handles with arms forward
Pull handles back squeezing shoulders
Squeeze rear delts
Return with control

name: Bradford Press
instructions:
Start with bar at front shoulders
Press bar up and over to back
Lower to back of neck
Press back up and over to front
Continue alternating

name: Bus Driver
instructions:
Hold weight plate out at shoulder height
Grip like steering wheel
Rotate plate clockwise then counterclockwise
Keep arms extended throughout
Maintain shoulder height

name: EZ Bar Curl
instructions:
Grip EZ bar at natural angle
Stand with bar at arm's length
Curl bar up to shoulders
Keep elbows stationary
Lower with control

name: Concentration Curl
instructions:
Sit with elbow braced on inner thigh
Hold dumbbell with arm extended
Curl weight up to shoulder
Squeeze bicep at top
Lower with control

name: Skull Crusher
instructions:
Lie on bench holding bar overhead
Lower bar by bending elbows
Bring bar toward forehead
Keep upper arms stationary
Extend arms back to start

name: Cable Bicep Curl
instructions:
Stand at low cable with bar
Grip bar with underhand grip
Curl bar up to shoulders
Keep elbows at sides
Lower with control

name: Rope Tricep Pushdown
instructions:
Attach rope to high cable
Grip rope ends with neutral grip
Push down spreading rope at bottom
Keep elbows at sides
Return with control

name: Zottman Curl
instructions:
Curl dumbbells up with palms up
Rotate wrists at top to palms down
Lower dumbbells with palms down
Rotate back at bottom
Repeat movement

name: Tricep Kickback
instructions:
Bend forward with elbow bent 90 degrees
Extend arm back straightening elbow
Squeeze tricep at full extension
Return to bent position
Keep upper arm stationary

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
instructions:
Sit on incline bench 45 degrees
Arms hang straight down
Curl dumbbells up together
Keep elbows back throughout
Lower with control

name: Tate Press
instructions:
Lie on bench with dumbbells over chest
Elbows out to sides palms facing feet
Lower dumbbells to chest
Press back up keeping elbows out
Focus on tricep contraction

name: Hollow Body Hold
instructions:
Lie on back arms overhead
Press lower back into floor
Lift shoulders and legs off ground
Hold body in curved hollow position
Maintain tension throughout

name: V-Up
instructions:
Lie flat on back arms overhead
Simultaneously raise arms and legs
Touch hands to feet at top
Form V shape with body
Lower back to start

name: Pallof Press
instructions:
Stand sideways to cable at chest height
Hold handle at chest with both hands
Press hands straight forward
Resist cable rotation
Return to chest

name: Dragon Flag
instructions:
Lie on bench gripping behind head
Raise entire body up keeping straight
Only shoulders touch bench
Lower body with control
Keep body rigid throughout

name: Cable Woodchop
instructions:
Stand sideways to high cable
Grip handle with both hands
Rotate torso pulling cable down and across
Pivot on back foot
Return with control

name: Landmine Rotation
instructions:
Hold end of landmine bar at chest
Feet wider than shoulders
Rotate bar side to side
Pivot on feet
Keep arms extended

name: Turkish Get-Up
instructions:
Lie holding weight overhead
Rise to standing in controlled sequence
Keep weight overhead throughout
Reverse movement back down
Maintain stability entire time

name: Kettlebell Windmill
instructions:
Hold weight overhead with one arm
Feet wide apart
Bend at waist toward opposite foot
Keep weight arm vertical
Return to standing

name: Lying Toe Touch
instructions:
Lie on back with legs vertical
Reach hands toward toes
Lift shoulders off ground
Touch toes at top
Lower back down
